name: Alert! Alert!
body:
# Alert! Alert! ## Current Vesion: 1.0.2 Alert! Alert! is a minimalist JavaScript growl-style notification library designed to run in modern browsers without external dependencies. ## Usage ```javascript var type = 'info', message = '

', config = { timeout: 7000 }; Alert.alert(type, message, config); ``` ## Demo http://codepen.io/whusterj/full/qEWMwG/
